# uptimekuma_notification_googlechat (Resource)

Google Chat notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_googlechat" "example" {
  name        = "My Google Chat Notification"
  webhook_url = "https://chat.googleapis.com/v1/spaces/SPACE_ID/messages?key=KEY&token=TOKEN"
  is_active   = true

  # Optional: Use a custom message template
  use_template = true
  template     = "Alert: {msg}"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) Google Chat webhook URL for sending notifications

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `template` (String) Custom message template for notifications
- `use_template` (Boolean) Enable custom message template

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
